name: DoraKone
description: Follow along with the adventures of Dulce as she finds new friends, new fun, and maybe even romance in the world of Dragon Connection, a hot new augmented reality mobile game.A, short, sweet free all-ages GxG visual novel featuring cute girls, friendship, and romance!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 1.66 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card Storage: 201 MB available space
